Description: Very dangerous intersection for motorists, particularly those turning right off Roberts Road to get onto Orrong. Orrong Road speed is too high for motorist to make a safe turn.

Location: Orrong Rd & Roberts Rd, Carlisle North
Description: There is a near miss or acceident at this intersection just about every time I am there.
I always see near misses of accidents at this intersection

Location: Alexander Rd & Orrong Rd, Carlisle North
Brighton Rd & Great Eastern Hwy, Rivervale
Description: At non-peak times, turning right here from Brighton Road onto Great Eastern Highway can take a long time. For example late at night with nil traffic.
The intersection of Newey St and Surrey Rd is confusing as the give way signage does not make it clear who has right of way
